title: UK Phenom Matt Brennan Wins Brutal Opening Stage at Catalunya
content:
GC favorites Primož Roglič and Juan Ayuso saved the day in cold, miserable conditions to open the week-long Volta a Catalunya, Kuss loses nearly 3 minutes.

Read the full article at UK Phenom Matt Brennan Wins Brutal Opening Stage at Catalunya on Velo.
author: ahood
